title: Ambrose Apartments: Coming Home Never Felt So Good
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath
Luxury is the norm at Ambrose in Bremerton, Washington.
With expertly crafted one, two, and three bedroom apartments and a well-curated collection of amenities, our stellar community is the home you’ve been searching for.
From the welcoming vibes to the convenience of great nearby destinations for dining, shopping, and outdoor recreation, Ambrose sets the stage for a comfortable lifestyle.
And when you want to feel the energy of the Emerald City, hop on the Fast Ferry and get to downtown Seattle in 30 minutes.
The best in Pacific Northwest living is waiting for you at Ambrose apartments.
Contact our friendly leasing team to set up a tour today.
Features:

2-Inch Faux Wood Blinds, Subway Tile Backsplashes, Stainless-Steel Appliances, Vaulted Ceilings, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Oversized Kitchen Islands*, Private Patio or Balcony*, Garages*, Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets w/ Under-Cabinet Lighting, In-Home Washer & Dryer, Quartz Countertops, Oversized Walk-In Closets, Private Yards*, AC Ports, Spacious 1, 2, & 3 Bedroom Floor Plans
*In Select Homes
Community Amenities:

Business Center, 24-Hour Fitness Center w/ Complimentary Protein Shakes, Playground, 24/7 Package Lockers, Clubhouse w/ Fireplace & Media Wall in the Lounge, Onsite Management, Onsite Dog Park, Coworking Pods & Private Coworking Offices, Outdoor Lounge with Ping Pong & Barbecue Grills, Resort-Worthy Pool & Spa, Conference Room, 30 Minutes to Downtown Seattle via The Bremerton Fast Ferry, Game Room w/ Billiards, Community Kitchen w/ Espresso Bar
Pet Policy
Pet friendly.
